alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 12 at 4:20PM EDT until April 12 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Dania Beach, or near Hollywood, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Dania Beach, Downtown Fort Lauderdale and Port Everglades. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
